workflow_description: Automated pipeline that scans Gmail for demo call emails, enriches with company research, and sends daily digest summaries

email_scanner.name: Email Scanner Agent
email_scanner.description: Scans Gmail every hour for emails containing 'Lyzr GPT', 'LyzrGPT', or 'Lizer GPT,' extracts demo call details including company name, meeting time, attendees, calendar invites, and contextual notes from email threads

data_extraction.name: Data Extraction Agent
data_extraction.description: Parses raw email content into structured call records: company name, meeting datetime (converted to IST), attendee list, meeting platform, and AI-generated contextual notes

company_research.name: Company Research Agent
company_research.description: Researches each company via web to determine employee count, estimated revenue, company size tier, industry, and assigns priority score (High/Medium/Low) based on company size and revenue

enrichment_coordinator.name: Enrichment Coordinator
enrichment_coordinator.description: Coordinates the structuring of extracted email data and company research, aggregates enriched call records with priority scoring

morning_digest.name: Morning Digest Agent
morning_digest.description: Compiles all new or updated demo calls from the past 24 hours into a formatted summary email and sends it via Gmail every morning at 8AM IST, highlighting new additions, priority changes, and today's upcoming calls

email_scanner_hourly.message: Fetch my recent 50 emails from Gmail using GMAIL_FETCH_EMAILS with max_results 50 (no query filter). Then analyze every email to find any related to Lyzr GPT demos, LyzrGPT, Lizer GPT, demo calls, demo meetings, product demos, or scheduled calls. Extract details for each match.

morning_digest_daily.message: Compile all new and updated demo calls from the past 24 hours. Create a formatted HTML summary email including: new calls added, updated calls, today's upcoming schedule, and priority highlights. Send the digest email via Gmail.

workflow_topology.flow: input_node -> email_scanner -> enrichment_coordinator -> [data_extraction, company_research] -> morning_digest -> output_node
